translation.en: Oi! You missed one, Paki!
translation.zh: 喂 你漏了一个 小巴

translation.en: I'm not from Pakistan.
translation.zh: 我不是巴基斯坦人

translation.en: [Jer] Dinner is ready.
translation.zh: 晚饭好了

translation.en: -I'm not hungry, Mum. -Hmm, where are you going?
translation.zh: 我不饿 妈 你去哪儿？

translation.en: -Out with friends. -A girl?
translation.zh: -跟朋友出去-女朋友吗？

translation.en: -[Freddie] Oh, Mum. -Look at you.
translation.zh: 不是 妈 看看你啊

translation.en: Give your mother a kiss.
translation.zh: 亲亲妈妈

translation.en: -I'm going to be late. -You're always late.
translation.zh: 我要晚点回来 你老是晚回来

translation.en: [Kashmira] Hi, Papa. How was work?
translation.zh: 爸爸 工作怎样？

translation.en: -Out again, Farrokh? -It's Freddie now, Papa.
translation.zh: 又出去啊 法洛克 我现在叫佛莱迪了 爸爸

translation.en: Freddie or Farrokh...
translation.zh: 不管是佛莱迪还是法洛克

translation.en: what difference does it make when you're out every night,
translation.zh: 天天晚上往外跑 不操心自己的前途

translation.en: no thought of the future in your head?
translation.zh: 叫什么有区别吗？

translation.en: Good thoughts, good words, good deeds.
translation.zh: 善思 善言 善行

translation.en: -That's what you should aspire to. -[Freddie] Yes.
translation.zh: 这才是你应该追求的 是啊

translation.en: And how's that worked out for you?
translation.zh: 那你又做得怎么样呢？

translation.en: [man] Yeah, they're better than last week.
translation.zh: 他们比上周表现好

translation.en: -[girl 1] They're a cool band. -[girl 2] Yeah, not bad.
translation.zh: -是啊 他们这乐队挺酷的-对 不错

translation.en: [girl 1] Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: -[bartender] What can I get for you? -[Freddie] Pint of lager.
translation.zh: -你喝点什么？-一杯拉格啤酒

translation.en: -Thank you. -Thanks.
translation.zh: -谢谢-谢了

translation.en: See you, mate.
translation.zh: 再见 哥们

translation.en: -Humpy Bong? -Humpy Bong.
translation.zh: 驼峰铃乐队吗？ 驼峰铃

translation.en: -They're going places. They're gonna be big. -Humpy Bong? Are you joking?
translation.zh: 他们在上升期 他们会火的 驼峰铃 开什么玩笑？

translation.en: -Don't do it, Tim. -No, I'm sorry, guys, but...
translation.zh: 别去 提姆 对不起大家 但是

translation.en: we're not going anywhere with this.
translation.zh: 我们这样也没有出头之日

translation.en: What? College gigs, pubs? [sighs]
translation.zh: 怎么 就在校园和酒吧演出吗？

translation.en: Gotta give it a go.
translation.zh: 我得放手一搏

translation.en: So I just said to him, "No, you can't do that."
translation.zh: 所以我跟他说 不 你不能这么做

translation.en: [man] You literally can't hear anything.
translation.zh: 你真的什么都听不见

translation.en: [Mary] It's a bit silly.
translation.zh: 这有点傻

translation.en: But then everyone else was in, like, long dresses?
translation.zh: 但后来大家都穿了 类似长裙吧

translation.en: But how bizarre.
translation.zh: 真奇怪

translation.en: You all right?
translation.zh: 你没事吧？

translation.en: Sorry. Oh, I was just looking for the band.
translation.zh: 对不起 我想找演出的乐队

translation.en: They're usually out back.
translation.zh: 他们一般都在后门外面

translation.en: I like your coat.
translation.zh: 我喜欢你的大衣

translation.en: [Mary] It's from Biba.
translation.zh: 我在碧芭买的

translation.en: She works there.
translation.zh: 她在那儿上班

translation.en: [Mary] Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢你了啊

translation.en: [Roger] I think he's right.
translation.zh: 或许他说得对

translation.en: That show was a load of bollocks.
translation.zh: 我们的演出是挺烂的

translation.en: Well, there was room for improvement, yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊 还有提升的空间 没错

translation.en: I've got better things to do with my Saturday nights.
translation.zh: 我周六晚上还有更好的安排呢

translation.en: I could give you their names.
translation.zh: 我可以说出她们的名字

translation.en: I enjoyed the show.
translation.zh: 我挺喜欢你们的演出

translation.en: -Thanks, man. -Thank you.
translation.zh: -谢了 哥们-谢谢

translation.en: I've been following you for a while, actually.
translation.zh: 其实 我关注你们有段时间了

translation.en: Smile... Makes sense for a dental student.
translation.zh: 微笑乐队 牙医专业的学生叫这个挺合适

translation.en: And you're astrophysics, aren't you?
translation.zh: 你是学天体物理的吧？

translation.en: -Yeah. -Makes you the clever one.
translation.zh: -对-所以你是比较聪明的那个

translation.en: -Yeah, I suppose it does, yeah. -I study design here.
translation.zh: 大概是吧 对 我在这儿学设计

translation.en: -[Roger] Oh, yeah? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -是吗？-是啊

translation.en: Also, um, I write songs. Might be of interest to you.
translation.zh: 我还会写歌 或许你们感兴趣

translation.en: It's just a bit of fun, really.
translation.zh: 就是写着玩的 真的

translation.en: Well, you're five minutes too late.
translation.zh: 你来晚了五分钟

translation.en: Our lead singer just quit.
translation.zh: 我们的主唱刚离队了

translation.en: Well, then you'll need someone new.
translation.zh: 那你们得招个新人了

translation.en: Any ideas?
translation.zh: 有什么想法吗？

translation.en: -What about me? -Uh, not with those teeth, mate.
translation.zh: 我怎么样 你那口牙可不行 哥们

translation.en: ♪ I know what I'm doin' ♪
translation.zh: 我知道我在做什么

translation.en: ♪ I got a feeling ♪
translation.zh: 我有种感觉

translation.en: ♪ I should be doin' all right ♪
translation.zh: 我应该过得还行

translation.en: [all harmonizing] ♪ Doin' all right ♪
translation.zh: 过得还行

translation.en: I was born with four additional incisors.
translation.zh: 我天生多长了4颗门牙

translation.en: More space in my mouth means more range.
translation.zh: 嘴里空间更大 音域更广

translation.en: I'll consider your offer.
translation.zh: 我考虑一下你们的邀请

translation.en: Uh, do you play bass?
translation.zh: 你会弹贝斯吗？

translation.en: Nope.
translation.zh: 不会

translation.en: Excuse me. Thanks.
translation.zh: 失陪了 谢谢

translation.en: So, you found me, then.
translation.zh: 看来 你还是找到我了

translation.en: -How can I help you? -Oh, um, I rather liked these.
translation.zh: 你想买点什么？ 我挺喜欢这条裤子

translation.en: Do you think you have them in my size?
translation.zh: 有我穿的尺码吗？

translation.en: This is the ladies' section, so I'm not exactly sure.
translation.zh: 这是女装部 我估计没有

translation.en: There wasn't a sign or anything.
translation.zh: 这儿也不挂个牌子

translation.en: I don't think it should really matter, do you?
translation.zh: 我觉得这也没什么大不了的 你说呢

translation.en: I thought you might like this.
translation.zh: 我猜你可能会喜欢这个

translation.en: -Are you even allowed to be in here? -No, not really.
translation.zh: 你可以进更衣室吗？ 并不能

translation.en: One more thing.
translation.zh: 还有一样

translation.en: May I?
translation.zh: 可以吗？

translation.en: You have such an exotic look.
translation.zh: 你看起来特别有异国情调

translation.en: I love your style.
translation.zh: 我喜欢你的风格

translation.en: I think we should all take more risks.
translation.zh: 我觉得每个人都应该大胆一些

translation.en: What do you think?
translation.zh: 你觉得呢？

translation.en: -[woman 1] Oh, cheers. -Thank you.
translation.zh: 哦 感谢 谢谢你

translation.en: -Hello, everybody. -[scattered cheering and applauding]
translation.zh: 大家好

translation.en: We've got a few, uh... few fresh faces.
translation.zh: 我们有两位新成员

translation.en: This is John Deacon, our bass player.
translation.zh: 这是约翰迪肯 贝斯手

translation.en: And our new lead singer, Freddie Bul... Bulsara... Freddie Bulsara.
translation.zh: 以及我们的新主唱 佛莱迪布…布萨拉 佛莱迪布萨拉

translation.en: That's right.
translation.zh: 没错 当然还有罗杰 最重要的成员

translation.en: And, uh... Roger, of course. The biggest member of them all.
translation.zh: 当然还有罗杰 最重要的成员

translation.en: [woman 2] Hey, Roger!
translation.zh: 嗨 罗杰

translation.en: Hello, all you beautiful people.
translation.zh: 晚上好 美丽的观众

translation.en: -Where's Tim? -Who's the Paki?
translation.zh: 提姆在哪儿？ 这小巴是谁？

translation.en: Ready, Freddie?
translation.zh: 准备好了吗？佛莱迪

translation.en: Let's do it.
translation.zh: 开始吧

translation.en: ♪ Keep yourself alive ♪
translation.zh: 活出你的人生

translation.en: ♪ I was told a million times Of all the troubles in my way ♪
translation.zh: 我听人说了百万遍 路上的坎坷危险

translation.en: ♪ Mind you grow a little wiser Little better every day ♪
translation.zh: 我听人说了百万遍 路上的坎坷危险 记住每天聪明一点 变好一点

translation.en: ♪ But if I rode A million rivers ♪
translation.zh: 记住每天聪明一点 变好一点 如果我穿过百万河流

translation.en: -♪ And I crossed a million miles ♪ -No.
translation.zh: 如果我穿过百万河流 不对

translation.en: -♪ Still be where I started ♪ -Wrong lyric!
translation.zh: 不对 歌词不对

translation.en: -♪ Bread and butter For a smile ♪ -Wrong lyric.
translation.zh: 歌词错了

translation.en: ♪ Sold a million mirrors In shopping alley ways ♪
translation.zh: 在商场走道中卖出百万面镜子

translation.en: ♪ But I never saw my face In any window any day ♪
translation.zh: 却从没在窗子里见过我自己的脸

translation.en: ♪ Now they say your folks Are telling you ♪
translation.zh: 现在他们说你父母告诉你

translation.en: ♪ Be a super star Tell you just be satisfied ♪
translation.zh: 现在他们说你父母告诉你 当个超级明星 但我说只要满足就好

translation.en: ♪ And stay right Where you are ♪
translation.zh: 只要做你自己

translation.en: ♪ Keep yourself alive Keep yourself alive ♪
translation.zh: 活出你的人生 活出你的人生

translation.en: ♪ All you people Keep yourself alive ♪
translation.zh: 活出你的人生 活出你的人生 你们所有人 活出你的人生

translation.en: Learn the song, Freddie.
translation.zh: 学学歌词吧 佛莱迪

translation.en: ♪ Do you think you're Better every day? ♪
translation.zh: （一年后）

translation.en: You're late.
translation.zh: 你们来晚了

translation.en: -[Roger] This is bollocks! -[John grunting]
translation.zh: 太扯了吧

translation.en: [Brian] It's, uh... it's counterclockwise, I think you'll find, John.
translation.zh: 逆时针拧才能拧得动 约翰

translation.en: Oh, is it? Thank you, Brian. Would you like to do it?
translation.zh: 是吗？多谢了 布赖恩

translation.en: -Please, feel free. -No, no, no. You're doing a good job.
translation.zh: 要不你来 不用不用 请便 不不不 你干得不错

translation.en: We sold out every pub and uni south of Glasgow,
translation.zh: 我们在格拉斯哥南部所有高校的票都卖光了

translation.en: and I'm stuck in the middle of nowhere, eating a ham sandwich!
translation.zh: 结果我站在这荒郊野外吃火腿三明治

translation.en: Trouble is, we're just not thinking big enough.
translation.zh: 问题是 我们现在想得还不够远大

translation.en: What have you got in mind, Fred?
translation.zh: 你在想什么 佛莱迪？

translation.en: -An album. -We can't afford an album.
translation.zh: 你在想什么 佛莱迪？ 出专辑 我们没钱出专辑

translation.en: Oh, we'll find a way.
translation.zh: 我们会想到办法的

translation.en: How much do you think we can get for this van?
translation.zh: 我们把这车卖了能换多少钱？

translation.en: I hope you're joking.
translation.zh: 你开玩笑吧

translation.en: -That's three months' wages. -And a perfectly good van.
translation.zh: 这可是三个月的收入 还有一辆好车

translation.en: Don't be so dramatic, darling.
translation.zh: 别这么夸张 亲爱的

translation.en: You're recording an album tonight. Let's go!
translation.zh: 你们要去录专辑啦 我们走吧

translation.en: -Don't you think I sound like shit? -No, it's good.
translation.zh: -你们不觉得我声音很难听吗？-没有啊 挺好的

translation.en: -Can we try it again? -Sure, yeah.
translation.zh: -我们再来一次好吗？-当然了

translation.en: -Sure, it's your money. -Literally.
translation.zh: 花的是你的钱嘛

translation.en: ♪ You are mine I posses you ♪
translation.zh: 都是你的

translation.en: -Sounds a lot better. -[Brian] We need to get experimental.
translation.zh: -听着好多了-我们得再大胆尝试

translation.en: Try bouncing us left and right for the ah-ah-ahs.
translation.zh: 试试啊啊啊那段左右切换音频

translation.en: Now dead center for the last.
translation.zh: 最后换到正中间

translation.en: -And then blast it! -Yes!
translation.zh: 然后音量顶上去 太好了

translation.en: That's good, right?
translation.zh: 挺好的吧

translation.en: Do we have time to stack a few more?
translation.zh: 我们还有时间再录点么

translation.en: The studio opens at 8:00, so we got 30 more minutes.
translation.zh: 录音室8点开门我们还有半个多小时

translation.en: -That sounds good, right? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -听起来不错 对吗？-对

translation.en: Oi, RT, who are these kids in the box?
translation.zh: 喂 RT 里面录音这几个孩子是谁

translation.en: A student band doing some weird stuff.
translation.zh: 一个做些奇怪东西的学生乐队

translation.en: -How about demos? You got some? -[sighs] Been up all night, mate.
translation.zh: 能听听小样吗？你有吗？ 折腾一晚上了 哥们

translation.en: -So the new name is Queen? -As in "Her Royal Highness."
translation.zh: 新的乐队名就叫皇后吗？ 皇后陛下那个皇后

translation.en: And because it's outrageous and I can't think of anyone more outrageous than me.
translation.zh: 皇后陛下那个皇后 而且因为这名字够出格 我想不出比我自己更出格的人了

translation.en: [chuckles] This is the most impractical bed.
translation.zh: 这床太不实用了

translation.en: That's beautiful.
translation.zh: 真好听

translation.en: Think it has potential.
translation.zh: 我觉得有潜力

translation.en: -I have to go to work. -I simply won't allow it.
translation.zh: -我得上班去了-不许去

translation.en: You're going to support me if I get fired?
translation.zh: 我被开除了你养我吗？

translation.en: I'll always look after you.
translation.zh: 我会一直照顾你的

translation.en: I'm going to... [chuckles] I'm going to be late.
translation.zh: 我要 我要迟到了

translation.en: How beautiful you are.
translation.zh: 你真美

translation.en: -[mouthing words] -[Mary] When I was a little girl
translation.zh: 我小的时候

translation.en: I used to run around the house and hide and...
translation.zh: 我老在屋里到处跑 捉迷藏

translation.en: he couldn't find me.
translation.zh: 他找不到我

translation.en: Clever girl.
translation.zh: 机灵丫头

translation.en: -Please tell your father it's nice to meet him. -I have.
translation.zh: -告诉你父亲 很高兴见到他-我说了

translation.en: Then thank him for the lovely birthday cake.
translation.zh: 谢谢他的生日蛋糕

translation.en: I have.
translation.zh: 我说了

translation.en: Then tell him his daughter's an epic shag.
translation.zh: 那就告诉他他女儿是个小淫娃

translation.en: Freddie, he can read lips.
translation.zh: 佛莱迪 我爸会读唇语

translation.en: [Jer] Mary...
translation.zh: 玛莉

translation.en: I can't tell you how long I have waited for Farrokh
translation.zh: 我都不知道等了多久 才等到法洛克

translation.en: -to bring home a nice girl like you. -Farrokh?
translation.zh: 带回来一个你这么好的姑娘 法洛克

translation.en: Did Farrokh not tell you he was born in Zanzibar?
translation.zh: 怎么 法洛克没告诉你他是在桑给巴尔出生的？

translation.en: -No, he did not. -[Roger] I used to know a girl
translation.zh: 没有

translation.en: -who was Zanzibari. -One minute.
translation.zh: -我认识桑给巴尔女孩-等下

translation.en: I thought Freddie was born in London.
translation.zh: 佛莱迪不是在伦敦出生的吗？

translation.en: -Oh, he was. At the age of 18. -Shut up.
translation.zh: -他是 18岁的时候-闭嘴

translation.en: Our family is Indian Parsee.
translation.zh: 我们家是印度帕西人

translation.en: -Mum. Mum, Mum. -Mary...
translation.zh: -妈 不行 妈-玛莉

translation.en: -Mum. -[Kashmira] Mum, please...
translation.zh: -妈-妈 别拿出来

translation.en: -Here. Have a look at these. -Yes. Yeah.
translation.zh: 给 看看吧

translation.en: Please! Please.
translation.zh: -好啊 好-拜托！拜托

translation.en: -No stopping. -[Brian] We need to see those.
translation.zh: -你可阻止不了-我们得看看

translation.en: A thousand years ago, the Parsees fled to India from Persia

translation.en: to escape Muslim persecution.

translation.en: -He's so small. -We were chased out with just the clothes on our backs.

translation.en: -[all laugh] -[Roger] Certainly a target.

translation.zh: -大概三四岁-真的吗？这么小就练拳击

translation.en: [Kashmira] So good.
translation.zh: 真好

translation.en: Mercury?

translation.en: Only forward.

translation.en: -It's just a stage name. -No, it's not.

translation.en: I changed it legally. Got a new passport and everything.

translation.en: [Kashmira] I don't know.

translation.en: He was too wild and unruly.

translation.en: But what good did it do?
translation.zh: 但又有什么用呢？

translation.en: -Good thoughts, good words, good deeds. -♪ I come from London town ♪

translation.en: anywhere pretending to be someone you're not.

translation.en: -[Jer] Who'd like some cake? -[singing continues]

translation.en: Cake is always good.

translation.en: Freddie Mercury. Phone call.

translation.en: Freddie tells me that you're some sort of a scientist.

translation.en: -Astrophysics, actually. -Oh.
translation.zh: 实际上是天体物理

translation.en: Yeah, my father would've preferred it if I continued.
translation.zh: 我爸还希望我继续深造

translation.en: -When? -[Jer] That's very clever.

translation.en: and possibly, even manage us.

translation.en: -Shut up. -You're joking!

translation.en: Oh, my God!

translation.en: So, this is Queen.

translation.en: And you must be Freddie Mercury.

translation.en: You've got a gift. You all have.

translation.en: what makes Queen any different from all the other wannabe rock stars I meet?

translation.en: We're four misfits who don't belong together, playing to the other misfits.
translation.zh: 我们是四个难以融入彼此的不合群的人

translation.en: The outcasts right at the back of the room who are pretty sure they don't belong either.

translation.en: -We belong to them. -We're a family.

translation.en: [Roger] But no two of us are the same.

translation.en: Paul.

translation.en: our new signing.

translation.en: - Top of the Pops? -Hopefully.

translation.en: -And then? -And then...

translation.en: it's only the biggest television program in the country.

translation.en: when I know I really have them...

translation.en: I'm exactly the person I was always meant to be.

translation.en: I'm not afraid of anything.

translation.en: The only other time I ever feel that way is when I'm with you.

translation.en: Yes!

translation.en: Uh, just down the hall.

translation.en: Oh, come on in. Make yourselves at home.

translation.en: -Don't mind us. -Hello, Mary. How's your dad?

translation.en: Yeah, pretty well. Thanks.

translation.en: -Good. -What's going on, Brian?
translation.zh: -很好-怎么了布赖恩？

translation.en: Well, if you'd answered your phone, you'd know already.

translation.en: This really isn't a good time, guys.
translation.zh: 这会儿不太方便 各位

translation.en: John Reid called today.
translation.zh: 约翰里德今天来电话了

translation.en: -He has a little tour in mind for us. -[Roger] It's not little, Brian.

translation.en: He's booked us a tour of America.

translation.en: The album's hit the charts in the US!

translation.en: Oh, yes!

translation.en: Yes!
translation.zh: 太好了

translation.en: [Brian] It's happening!
translation.zh: 我们出名了

translation.en: Now, who wants to take a ride?

translation.en: ♪ I was singing with my band ♪ ♪ Across the water Across the land ♪
translation.zh: （美国 中西部）

translation.en: -[song continues] -[Freddie] We love you, Cleveland!
translation.zh: 我们爱你 克利夫兰

translation.en: We love you, Houston!

translation.en: We love you, Denver! Very happy to be here!

translation.en: -[Mary] And are the crowds big? -Well, we're selling out every night.
translation.zh: 观众人多吗？ 嗯 我们每晚都卖空了

translation.en: I just wish you were here to see it. They really love us.
translation.zh: 真希望你能亲眼看到 这儿的人特别爱我们

translation.en: We love you, Portland!
translation.zh: 我们爱你 波特兰

translation.en: He's got a big ass, too!
translation.zh: 他也有个大屁股

translation.en: We love you, New Orleans!

translation.en: We love you, Atlanta!

translation.en: [Freddie] Rog, come down here and say hello.

translation.en: We love you, Pittsburgh!

translation.en: -Roger! -[Freddie] Now, hit it!

translation.en: -[Mary] I'm good. I just miss you. -[Freddie] What are you doing?

translation.en: You can't possibly be having any fun without me.
translation.zh: 你在做什么？ 我不在你肯定没那么多乐趣了

translation.en: [Mary] Nothing as exciting as America.
translation.zh: 我不在你肯定没那么多乐趣了 什么也比不上美国让人激动

translation.en: Say hi to the boys for me.
translation.zh: 替我跟其他人问好

translation.en: -I will. Love you. -Bye, Freddie. I love you.

translation.en: ♪ Get on your bikes and ride Ride 'em, cowboy ♪
translation.zh: 男厕

translation.en: Hello.
translation.zh: 大家好

translation.en: -[John] You're late. -[Freddie] Am I?
translation.zh: -你迟到了-是吗？

translation.en: We saved you a seat.
translation.zh: 我们给你留了个位置

translation.en: -Lovely. -[John] Okay.
translation.zh: -太好了-行

translation.en: So, now that we're all here Jim, this is Ray Foster.
translation.zh: 既然人到齐了 吉姆 这位是雷福斯特

translation.en: -Ray, this is the band's lawyer, Jim Beach. -Hello.
translation.zh: 吉姆 这位是雷福斯特 雷 这是乐队的律师 吉姆海滩

translation.en: You must stop calling him that.
translation.zh: -你好-别再这么叫他了

translation.en: -That's his name. -No, we cannot keep calling him "Jim Beach."
translation.zh: 这是他的名字 我们不能一直叫他吉姆海滩

translation.en: No, that's absurd, not to mention unspeakably boring.
translation.zh: 我们不能一直叫他吉姆海滩 太荒唐了 而且很无趣

translation.en: -Miami. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 迈阿密

translation.en: From now on, I dub thee "Miami Beach."
translation.zh: 从现在开始 我叫你迈阿密海滩

translation.en: The sun always sets behind you, doesn't it? On Miami Beach.
translation.zh: 太阳总在你身后落下 对吗？在迈阿密海滩上

translation.en: Hmm, right.

translation.en: Now that everybody's got an acceptable name let's get to it.

translation.en: Look... we just really need something special.
translation.zh: 说正事吧 我们真的需要些特别的东西

translation.en: More hits. Like "Killer Queen" only bigger.
translation.zh: 再多一些畅销曲 像《杀手女王》那种 不过再火一些

translation.en: It's not bloody widgets we're making.
translation.zh: 我们不是造零件

translation.en: We can't just reproduce "Killer Queen."
translation.zh: 我们不能复制《杀手女王》

translation.en: [Freddie] No.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: We can do better.
translation.zh: 我们能写出更好的

translation.en: It's opera.
translation.zh: 是歌剧

translation.en: -Opera! -Opera!
translation.zh: -歌剧-歌剧

translation.en: There seems to be an echo in here.
translation.zh: 这里似乎有回声

translation.en: See, we don't want to repeat ourselves. The same formula over and over.
translation.zh: 我们不想重复自己 反复用一样的套路

translation.en: [Freddie] Formulas are a complete and utter waste of time.

translation.en: Formulas work. Let's stick with the formulas.
translation.zh: 套路有用啊 我们还是按套路来

translation.en: -I like formulas. -We'll call the album...

translation.en: A Night at the Opera.
translation.zh: 《歌剧院一夜》

translation.en: Are you aware that no one actually likes opera?
translation.zh: 你们知道没人真的喜欢歌剧吧？

translation.en: I like opera.
translation.zh: 我挺喜欢歌剧

translation.en: -Do you? -I do.

translation.en: John.

translation.en: -No. -Okay, how about John's song...

translation.en: "You're My Best Friend." You know?

translation.en: "Ooh, you make me live." Catchy, stronger.

translation.en: -What about "I'm in Love with My Car"? -You're joking! Oh, Jesus.

translation.en: I love it.
translation.zh: 我喜欢

translation.en: Well, that's the kind of song

translation.en: teenagers can crank up the volume in their car and bang their heads to.

translation.en: [Brian] It's a band decision. "Bohemian Rhapsody." That's it.

translation.en: -"You're My Best Friend," and it's my money. -Bo-Rap, period.
translation.zh: -就是它了-《你是我的挚友》 你们花的是我的钱 《波西米亚狂想曲》 就这样了

translation.en: Or we walk.

translation.en: "MacArthur Park" was seven minutes long.
translation.zh: 《麦克阿瑟公园》有7分钟长

translation.en: -It was a hit. -Look, I'm not arguing "Bohemian" whatever's...

translation.en: -"Rhapsody." -...musicianship.

translation.en: But there's no way in hell the station will play

translation.en: a 6-minute quasi-operatic dirge comprised of nonsense words! Bismillah?

translation.en: Bullshit! I paid for this record, so I say what goes!

translation.en: No, he's got all your balls in a vice.

translation.en: to the average person...

translation.en: We're going with "You're My Best Friend."

translation.en: -Done. -[Freddie] No.

translation.en: We know what we have, even if you don't.

translation.en: It's called "Bohemian Rhapsody."

translation.en: You will forever be known as the man who lost Queen.

translation.en: Temperamental artists, eh?

translation.en: by the end of the year no one will know the name Queen.

translation.en: -Christ! -[laughter]

translation.en: -[Freddie] Twat! -Wanker!

translation.en: -[Freddie] Asshole! -You'll never have a gold disk,

translation.en: you medium talent!

translation.en: And to think I worked with Hendrix.
translation.zh: 我还跟吉米亨德里克斯合作过呢

translation.en: [Kenny] In the studio today, singer Frederick Mercury!
translation.zh: 今天来作客的是 直播中 歌手佛莱迪摩克瑞

translation.en: So what have you got today for us?
translation.zh: 你今天给我们带来了什么？

translation.en: Have you got a little taste of the new record?
translation.zh: 让我们试听一下新专辑

translation.en: I'm really not supposed to.
translation.zh: 我真的不该这么做

translation.en: Oh, forbidden fruit? Don't tempt me!
translation.zh: 我真的不该这么做 禁果吗？别诱惑我

translation.en: -Oh, "I'm in Love with My Car"! -Other side.
translation.zh: -《我爱上了我的车》-另外一面

translation.en: -"Bohemian Rhapsody." -I didn't know Freddie knew Kenny so well.
translation.zh: 《波西米亚狂想曲》 -没想到佛莱迪跟肯尼这么熟-BBC不肯放这歌

translation.en: -[Freddie] The BBC won't play it. -Nor did I.
translation.zh: -没想到佛莱迪跟肯尼这么熟-BBC不肯放这歌

translation.en: In fact, no one will play it on the radio, so EMI won't release it.
translation.zh: 我也没想到 事实上 没有电台愿意放这首歌 所以百代唱片不想发行这首歌

translation.en: -[Kenny] What's wrong with this song? -Nothing's wrong with it at all.
translation.zh: 所以百代唱片不想发行这首歌 这首歌有什么问题吗？ 什么问题都没有

translation.en: -Except that it's six minutes long. -Six minutes?
translation.zh: 什么问题都没有 只是有6分钟长

translation.en: -You'd have to be mad to play it. -Oh, you'd have to be bonkers.
translation.zh: 6分钟 你得是疯了才会放这首歌

translation.en: -I positively forbid it. -Let's hear it.
translation.zh: 那得是癫狂了 -我绝不允许-我们听听看吧

translation.en: Ladies and ladies,
translation.zh: 女士们 女士们

translation.en: a Capital Radio exclusive,
translation.zh: 首都电台独家放送

translation.en: for the first time ever... "Bohemian Rhapsody"!
translation.zh: 史上首播 《波西米亚狂想曲》

translation.en: ♪ Is this the real life? Is this just fantasy? ♪
translation.zh: 这是真的人生吗？ 还是幻想而已

translation.en: ♪ Caught in a landslide ♪
translation.zh: 矫揉造作 旋律制造者 松散而空洞 仍旧对齐柏林飞艇东施效颦

translation.en: ♪ No escape from reality ♪
translation.zh: 他们用乐器效果效仿歌剧 就像糟糕的电影配乐苍白地奏响交响乐 可惜毫无诗意 时代杂志 皇后乐队急于强调他们的严肃性

translation.en: ♪ Open your eyes ♪
translation.zh: 应该被沉到海底的一首歌永不见天日 一盘刺耳的大杂烩 滚石

translation.en: ♪ Look up to the skies And see ♪
translation.zh: 华而不实又冗长 无趣的拙劣模仿 几乎没有一句抓人的一首没有副歌也没有尝试的歌 《唱片镜》 很空洞 表面华丽精致 却无灵魂 六分钟里至少有六种不相干的类型 差强人意

translation.en: ♪ So you think you can stone Me and spit in my eye? ♪
translation.zh: （爱丁堡 1976年）

translation.en: ♪ So you think you can love Me and leave me to die? ♪
translation.zh: 你以为可以爱我 然后任由我死去

translation.en: ♪ Oh, baby ♪
translation.zh: 哦 宝贝

translation.en: ♪ Can't do this to me, baby ♪
translation.zh: 不能这样对我 宝贝

translation.en: ♪ Just gotta get out ♪
translation.zh: 必须挣脱

translation.en: ♪ Just gotta get right Outta here, yeah ♪
translation.zh: 必须挣脱出去 耶

translation.en: How much do they love him? Can't get enough.
translation.zh: 看看观众有多爱他 永远看不够

translation.en: ♪ Nothing really matters Anyone can see ♪
translation.zh: 一切都无关紧要 任何人都知道

translation.en: ♪ Nothing really matters ♪
translation.zh: 一切都无关紧要

translation.en: ♪ Nothing really matters To me ♪
translation.zh: 一切都无关紧要 对我而言

translation.en: ♪ Any way the wind blows... ♪
translation.zh: 无论风吹向何处

translation.en: -["Now I'm Here" playing] -♪ Here I stand, here I stand ♪
translation.zh: （利物浦）

translation.en: ♪ Looked around, around Around, around, around ♪
translation.zh: （东京 底特律 珀斯） （格拉斯哥 纽约 伦敦）

translation.en: ♪ But you won't see me But you won't see me ♪
translation.zh: （格拉斯哥 纽约 伦敦） （圣莫尼卡 波士顿 大阪）

translation.en: ♪ Now I'm here Now I'm here ♪
translation.zh: （匹兹堡 芝加哥 悉尼）

translation.en: -♪ I'm just a... ♪ -[crowd cheering]
translation.zh: （里约）

translation.en: Tom, Jerry, can you hear me?
translation.zh: 汤姆 杰瑞 能听见吗？

translation.en: -Freddie, when do I get to see you? -I'll be home soon, darling.
translation.zh: 佛莱迪 我什么时候能见到你？ 我很快就回家了 亲爱的

translation.en: Will you put Romeo on the phone so I can tell him I miss him?
translation.zh: 你让罗密欧接电话好吗？我要告诉他我想他

translation.en: Do you miss me?
translation.zh: 你想我吗？

translation.en: What a stupid question. Of course I do.
translation.zh: 这问题太傻了 我当然想你了

translation.en: I love you.
translation.zh: 我爱你

translation.en: Good night.
translation.zh: 晚安

translation.en: [Paul] Morning, boss.
translation.zh: 早上好 老板

translation.en: Clean this mess up and get rid of your friend.
translation.zh: 收拾干净 让你的朋友快走

translation.en: Get dressed.
translation.zh: 穿上衣服

translation.en: According to Brian it was the largest paying audience in history.
translation.zh: 听布赖恩说 那是历史上买票观众最多的一次

translation.en: The whole night...
translation.zh: 整个晚上

translation.en: I didn't know if they understood a thing I was saying.
translation.zh: 我都不知道他们有没有听懂我说的一个字

translation.en: And then...
translation.zh: 然后

translation.en: [crowd] ♪ Love of my life You've hurt me ♪
translation.zh: 我的至爱 你伤害了我

translation.en: ♪ You've broken my heart ♪
translation.zh: 你伤透了我的心

translation.en: ♪ And now you leave me ♪
translation.zh: 现在你又离开了我

translation.en: ♪ Love of my life Can't you see? ♪
translation.zh: 现在你又离开了我 我的至爱 你不明白吗？

translation.en: ♪ Bring it back Bring it back ♪
translation.zh: 回来吧 回来吧

translation.en: -♪ Don't take it away from me ♪ -They're all singing.
translation.zh: 别弃我而去 他们全都唱起来了

translation.en: Thousands of them.
translation.zh: 成千上万的人

translation.en: All singing to you.
translation.zh: 都对着你唱

translation.en: Because it's true.
translation.zh: 因为那是真实的感情

translation.en: -Freddie, what's wrong? -♪ Love of my life Don't leave me ♪
translation.zh: 佛莱迪 有什么事吗？ 我的至爱 别离开我

translation.en: ♪ You've stolen my love And now desert me ♪
translation.zh: 你偷走了我的心 现在又抛弃了我

translation.en: Something's been wrong for a while now.
translation.zh: 事情不对劲已经有段时间了

translation.en: Say it.
translation.zh: 说出来吧

translation.en: Say it.
translation.zh: 说出来

translation.en: I've been thinking about it a lot.
translation.zh: 我一直思来想去

translation.en: I think I'm bisexual.
translation.zh: 我觉得我是双性恋

translation.en: Freddie, you're gay.
translation.zh: 佛莱迪 你是同性恋

translation.en: I've known for a while now, I just didn't want to admit it.
translation.zh: 我已经知道一段时间了只是不想承认

translation.en: It's funny, really. This is what I always settle for.
translation.zh: 也是奇怪这一直是我无奈接受的说辞

translation.en: "I love you, but..." "I love you, Mary, but I need space."
translation.zh: 我爱你 但是 我爱你 玛莉 但我需要空间

translation.en: "I love you, Mary, but I've met someone else."
translation.zh: 我爱你 玛莉 但我遇见了别人

translation.en: And now, "I love you, but I'm..."
translation.zh: 现在 我爱你 但我是

translation.en: And this is the hardest, because it's not even your fault.
translation.zh: 这才是最难接受的因为这根本不是你的错

translation.en: No, don't take it off.
translation.zh: 不 别摘掉

translation.en: Don't take it off. You promised me you'd never take it off.
translation.zh: 别摘 你答应过我永远不会摘掉

translation.en: What do you want from me?
translation.zh: 你想要我给你什么

translation.en: Almost everything.
translation.zh: 差不多所有东西

translation.en: I want you in my life.
translation.zh: 我想让你留在我生命里

translation.en: Why?
translation.zh: 为什么？

translation.en: We believe in each other.
translation.zh: 我们相信彼此

translation.en: And that's everything.
translation.zh: 这是最重要的

translation.en: For us.
translation.zh: 对我们足够了

translation.en: Your life is going to be very difficult.
translation.zh: 你的人生会很坎坷

translation.en: What do you think?
translation.zh: 你觉得怎么样？

translation.en: -Gay-er. -Not this, darling, the house. Isn't it amazing?
translation.zh: 更像基佬了 不是胡子 亲爱的 我说的是房子 多壮观啊

translation.en: Mary's already moved in next door, so she can visit the cats and me.
translation.zh: 玛莉已经搬到隔壁了可以随时来看我和猫

translation.en: -[Roger] Uh-huh. -Each cat will have his own room.
translation.zh: 每只猫都有自己的房间

translation.en: Delilah's by the kitchen, Miko's next door.
translation.zh: 黛莉拉在厨房边上 米可在隔壁

translation.en: Tiffany, Oscar, Romeo, all upstairs.
translation.zh: 蒂凡尼 奥斯卡 罗密欧 都在楼上

translation.en: Lilly's room is even larger than this one! Spoilt thing.
translation.zh: 莉莉的房间比这间还大 被惯坏了

translation.en: [Roger] Well, I'm not sure the echo is quite pronounced enough.
translation.zh: 我觉得回音还不够响

translation.en: Oh, I knew you'd appreciate it.
translation.zh: 我知道你会欣赏这里

translation.en: Stay for dinner. Anything you fancy.
translation.zh: 留下吃饭吧 随你挑

translation.en: I can't. Wife, kids, you know.
translation.zh: 不行 还有老婆孩子 你明白

translation.en: Of course.
translation.zh: 当然了

translation.en: Well, come on. We'll eat off the floor. It's clean enough.
translation.zh: 来吧 我们可以坐地上吃 都打扫干净了

translation.en: Another time, Fred.
translation.zh: 下次吧 佛莱迪

translation.en: -[Mary] Hello? -Mary.
translation.zh: -喂-玛莉

translation.en: -Hi. -Hello, my love.
translation.zh: -嗨-你好 亲爱的

translation.en: [Mary] Hi.
translation.zh: 你好

translation.en: I need you to do something for me,
translation.zh: 我需要你帮我做点事

translation.en: but you can't ask any questions.
translation.zh: 但是什么也不许问

translation.en: Freddie, what are you doing this time?
translation.zh: -佛莱迪 你这次又要干嘛？-不 我刚告诉你

translation.en: No, I just told you, you can't ask any questions.
translation.zh: -佛莱迪 你这次又要干嘛？-不 我刚告诉你 什么也不许问

translation.en: Right.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: I want you to go to your bedroom window.
translation.zh: 我想要你走到你卧室窗前

translation.en: Look out of it.
translation.zh: 往外看

translation.en: -Do you see me? -Yes, I do see you.
translation.zh: -你看见我了吗？-看见了

translation.en: Now, you do the same.
translation.zh: 现在你照着做

translation.en: Keep yours on.
translation.zh: 把你的灯开着

translation.en: Come have a drink.
translation.zh: 来喝杯酒

translation.en: -Now? -Right now.
translation.zh: -现在吗？-就现在

translation.en: It's late, Freddie.
translation.zh: 很晚了 佛莱迪

translation.en: Come on.
translation.zh: 喝吧

translation.en: Please.
translation.zh: 求你了

translation.en: Do you have something to drink?
translation.zh: 你有什么可以喝的吗？

translation.en: I suppose.
translation.zh: 应该有

translation.en: Go get it. Pour yourself something.
translation.zh: 去拿出来 给你自己倒上

translation.en: Pour yourself a drink, darling.
translation.zh: 给自己倒一杯 亲爱的

translation.en: Do you have it?
translation.zh: 倒好了吗？

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 好了

translation.en: -Cheers. -Cheers.
translation.zh: 干杯 干杯吧

translation.en: -To you, my love. -To you, Freddie.
translation.zh: 敬你 亲爱的 敬你 佛莱迪

translation.en: -Good night. -Good night.
translation.zh: 晚安了 晚安

translation.en: -[Paul] Hello? -Paul.
translation.zh: -喂-保罗

translation.en: -[Paul] Freddie? -Sweetheart, I want to throw a party.
translation.zh: 佛莱迪 甜心 我想开个派对

translation.en: -[Paul] Okay. Who do you want to invite? -People.
translation.zh: 好 你都想邀请谁 所有人

translation.en: I want you to shake the freak tree and invite anyone who plops to the ground.
translation.zh: 我想要你邀请所有能来的奇人异士

translation.en: -[Paul laughs] -Dwarves and giants...
translation.zh: 我想要你邀请所有能来的奇人异士 矮人 巨人

translation.en: magicians, Zulu tribesmen, contortionists...
translation.zh: 变戏法的 非洲祖鲁族人 会柔术的

translation.en: -["Crazy Little Thing Called Love" playing] -...fire eaters...
translation.zh: 吞火的

translation.en: ...and priests. We're going to need to confess.
translation.zh: 还有神父 我们会有很多罪要忏悔

translation.en: -Fill me up, will you, Trixie? -Marvelous, Fred! You've outdone yourself!
translation.zh: 给我满上好吗？特里克茜 太精彩了 佛莱迪 你超越了自己

translation.en: Thank you, John. I'm so glad you love it!
translation.zh: 谢谢 约翰 很高兴你喜欢

translation.en: Mmm. They say money can't buy happiness, darlings!
translation.zh: 人们说金钱换不来快乐 亲爱的

translation.en: But it does allow you to give it away!
translation.zh: 但它能让你四处挥洒

translation.en: -I see you and Paul are getting along quite well. -He's Trixie now...
translation.zh: 看来你和保罗相处得不错 他现在叫特里克茜了

translation.en: 'cause he's always up to something.
translation.zh: 因为他老耍小把戏

translation.en: -[chuckles] -[Brian] So, tell me, Rog...
translation.zh: 那么 告诉我 罗杰

translation.en: what's the sexiest part of a car?
translation.zh: 车上最性感的地方是什么

translation.en: Well, well, well!
translation.zh: 哎哟哟

translation.en: -[Brian] Ah, your majesty! -No, I'm not her majesty!
translation.zh: 女王陛下 不 我可不是女王陛下

translation.en: We're her majesty, darlings!
translation.zh: 我们都是女王陛下 亲爱的

translation.en: Cheers! -Cheers! -Cheers!
translation.zh: -干杯-干杯

translation.en: -Cheers! -[Freddie] Thank you, my loves!
translation.zh: -干杯-干杯

translation.en: -Rog. -Where's Mary?
translation.zh: -谢谢你们 亲爱的罗杰 玛莉呢？

translation.en: [sighs] It's not exactly her scene, is it, Freddie?
translation.zh: 玛莉呢？ 她不喜欢这种场面吧 佛莱迪

translation.en: -Fabulous, isn't it? -If you say so.
translation.zh: 多绚丽啊 对吗？ 随你怎么说吧

translation.en: You're starting to look like each other.
translation.zh: 你们俩越打扮越像了

translation.en: What's wrong with that, Brian?
translation.zh: 那又有什么不对吗？布赖恩

translation.en: You're supposed to be in a rock band, Freddie. -Not the Village People. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 你是摇滚乐队成员 佛莱迪不是迪斯科团员

translation.en: You might want to think about cutting your hair one day.
translation.zh: 或许哪天你会想把头发剪了

translation.en: Never. I was born like this.
translation.zh: 才不 我生下来就是这样

translation.en: -["Super Freak" by Rick James playing] -Come on!
translation.zh: 来吧

translation.en: -Let's dance! -Yes!
translation.zh: -来跳舞-好耶

translation.en: I don't dance, Freddie.
translation.zh: 我不跳舞 佛莱迪

translation.en: I need a few more of these for that.
translation.zh: 我还得再喝几杯才有胆跳

translation.en: It's my party, and I demand you dance!
translation.zh: 这是我的派对 我命令你们跳舞

translation.en: We should go. -By royal decree! -[both chuckle]
translation.zh: -我们走吧-动用王室的权力

translation.en: -We're gonna go, actually. -Oh, God! You're dull.
translation.zh: 实际上 我们该走了 天啊 你们真无聊

translation.en: -If you were any more dull, you'd be Deacy. -What are you complaining about?
translation.zh: 你再无聊一点 就要变成迪肯了 你有什么好不满意的？

translation.en: You've got your little pet.
translation.zh: 你的小宠物不是在吗？

translation.en: I have... and he's loyal.
translation.zh: 是啊 他很忠诚

translation.en: Loyalty's so important. Don't you think, Dominique?
translation.zh: 忠诚很重要 你说呢 多米尼克

translation.en: Careful, Fred.
translation.zh: 小心点 佛莱迪

translation.en: -Let's go. -[Freddie] Where you going?
translation.zh: -走吧-你去哪儿？

translation.en: [Roger] Home.
translation.zh: 回家

translation.en: -Just a joke. -Freddie, sometimes you're a total prick.
translation.zh: 开个玩笑 佛莱迪 有时候你真是混蛋

translation.en: Forget them.
translation.zh: 别管他们

translation.en: Come on! Your guests are waiting.
translation.zh: 来吧 你的客人还等着呢

translation.en: They all want a little Mercury in their cup.
translation.zh: 他们都想见见佛莱迪摩克瑞

translation.en: Come on.
translation.zh: 过来

translation.en: All right!
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: My darlings, the time has finally come...
translation.zh: 亲爱的各位 终于是时候了

translation.en: -to get absolutely shit-faced! -[all cheering]
translation.zh: 现在开始 不醉不归

translation.en: Señor, where's my marching powder?
translation.zh: 先生 我的白粉呢？

translation.en: You've got a set of balls.
translation.zh: 你可真有种啊

translation.en: -[scoffs] Go fetch me a drink and find out. -I may work for you tonight,
translation.zh: 给我拿杯喝的 我就让你见识一下 或许我今晚为你服务

translation.en: but put your hands on me again, and I'll thump you.
translation.zh: 但是你再碰我一下 我就揍扁你

translation.en: -Got it? -I'm... I'm terribly sorry.
translation.zh: 懂了吗？ 我很抱歉

translation.en: I didn't mean to offend you. I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 我很抱歉 我无意冒犯 对不起

translation.en: I won't do that again, all right?
translation.zh: 不会再发生了 好吗？

translation.en: Let me... let me get you a beer.
translation.zh: 我请你喝杯啤酒

translation.en: I wouldn't mind a beer.
translation.zh: 我不介意喝杯啤酒

translation.en: Can you just tell me where we keep them? [chuckles]
translation.zh: 你能告诉我啤酒放在哪儿么？

translation.en: You're very handsome.
translation.zh: 你很帅气

translation.en: I love a man in uniform.
translation.zh: 我喜欢穿制服的男人

translation.en: So do I.
translation.zh: 我也是

translation.en: So, all your friends have left you alone.
translation.zh: 所以你的朋友都丢下你走了

translation.en: They're not my friends. Not really.
translation.zh: 他们不是我的朋友 算不上朋友

translation.en: Just distraction.
translation.zh: 帮我分散精力罢了

translation.en: From what?
translation.zh: 分散什么精力

translation.en: The in-between moments, I suppose.
translation.zh: 大概是空档期吧

translation.en: I find them intolerable. All of the...
translation.zh: 我无法忍受 你以为

translation.en: darkness you thought you left behind comes creeping back in.
translation.zh: 已经抛掉的黑暗 卷土重来

translation.en: I know what you mean.
translation.zh: 我知道你的意思

translation.en: Really?
translation.zh: 真的吗？

translation.en: What is it that you do with them?
translation.zh: 那你怎么熬过这段时间？

translation.en: Spend them with real friends.
translation.zh: 和真正的朋友一起度过

translation.en: You look like you could use a friend.
translation.zh: 你看起来需要朋友

translation.en: I like you.
translation.zh: 我喜欢你

translation.en: I like you too, Freddie.
translation.zh: 我也喜欢你 佛莱迪

translation.en: Come and find me when you decide you like yourself.
translation.zh: 等你决定喜欢你自己了 再来找我

translation.en: Can I have your name at least?
translation.zh: 我能至少知道你的名字吗？

translation.en: It's Jim Hutton.
translation.zh: 吉姆赫顿

translation.en: -Good night, Jim. -Good night, Freddie.
translation.zh: -晚安 吉姆-晚安 佛莱迪

translation.en: -That's a good idea. -♪ Hey ♪
translation.zh: 这是个好主意

translation.en: ♪ I'm gonna get you, too ♪
translation.zh: 我也会干掉你的

translation.en: ♪ Another one bites the dust ♪
translation.zh: 然后你叠上去

translation.en: ♪ How do you think I'm gonna get along ♪
translation.zh: 你认为我会如何自处

translation.en: ♪ Without you when You're gone? ♪
translation.zh: 你认为我会如何自处 如果没有了你

translation.en: ♪ You took me for Everything that I had ♪
translation.zh: 你夺走了我的一切

translation.en: ♪ And kicked me Out on my own ♪
translation.zh: 你夺走了我的一切 把我独自赶了出来

translation.en: ♪ Are you happy? Are you satisfied? ♪
translation.zh: 你开心了吗？你满意了吗？

translation.en: ♪ How long can you Stand the heat? ♪
translation.zh: 你开心了吗？你满意了吗？ 你还能忍受多久煎熬？

translation.en: ♪ Out of the doorway The bullets rip ♪
translation.zh: 子弹从门前弹出

translation.en: ♪ To the sound of the beat Look out! ♪
translation.zh: 跟着节拍 当心

translation.en: [reporters] Freddie!
translation.zh: 佛莱迪

translation.en: [critic 1] Freddie! Freddie, as the leader of Queen...
translation.zh: 佛莱迪 佛莱迪作为皇后乐队的领袖

translation.en: as the leader of Queen, do you feel responsible
translation.zh: 作为皇后乐队的领袖 你觉得乐队成功是你的功劳吗？

translation.en: -for the success of the band? -I'm not the leader of Queen,
translation.zh: 你觉得乐队成功是你的功劳吗？ （伦敦 1982年）

translation.en: I'm only the lead singer.
translation.zh: 我不是皇后乐队的领袖 我只是主唱

translation.en: Freddie! A question for Freddie. Do you ever doubt your talent?
translation.zh: 佛莱迪 问佛莱迪的问题 你怀疑过自己的天赋吗？

translation.en: No, that's a stupid question.
translation.zh: 不 这是个蠢问题

translation.en: -Take it easy, Fred. -What's next?
translation.zh: -冷静 佛莱迪-下一个

translation.en: [critic 2] Freddie, uh, your teeth!
translation.zh: 佛莱迪 你的牙

translation.en: Why don't you get your teeth fixed?
translation.zh: 你为什么不把牙整好？

translation.en: -I live in Britain. I don't want to stand out. -[laughter]
translation.zh: 我住在英国 整齐的牙太惹眼

translation.en: -Next... -Why don't you have your manners fixed?
translation.zh: -下一个-你为什么不有点礼貌？

translation.en: -That's an asshole question to ask anybody. -That's an asshole question.
translation.zh: 这问题问谁都很没教养 这不是个问题

translation.en: In your song "Life Is Real," what do you mean by the line, "Love is a roulette wheel"?
translation.zh: 你的歌《生活很真实》里这句词是什么意思？ 爱情是场轮盘赌博

translation.en: Are you implying that the more partners you have,
translation.zh: 是否是指 爱人越多

translation.en: the more chances you have of... contracting something?
translation.zh: 越有可能 染上什么？

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: I don't know, I haven't figured out love yet.
translation.zh: 我不知道 我还没弄明白爱情呢

translation.en: But it implies something else, Freddie.
translation.zh: 但它暗示了其他东西 佛莱迪

translation.en: That might be a better question for Rog.
translation.zh: 或许这个问题更适合罗杰来答

translation.en: -Watch it. -[reporters clamoring]
translation.zh: 小心点

translation.en: [critic 1] Freddie, concerning your private life...
translation.zh: 佛莱迪 关于你的私人生活

translation.en: there's lots of pictures of you in the tabloids looking drunk or ill.
translation.zh: 小报登了很多你的照片 有你喝醉或不适的样子

translation.en: -Which one is it, ill or drunk? -I had a cold last week, if anyone cares.
translation.zh: 到底是喝醉还是不适 我上周得了流感 如果有人关心的话

translation.en: As much as we'd love to answer questions about colds...
translation.zh: 尽管我们很喜欢回答流感相关的问题

translation.en: I'd like to speak about the album.
translation.zh: 我想谈谈专辑

translation.en: If anyone's got any questions about the music?
translation.zh: 有谁要问有关音乐的问题吗？

translation.en: -[all] Freddie! Freddie! Freddie! -Freddie, your parents they...
translation.zh: 佛莱迪 佛莱迪 佛莱迪 佛莱迪 佛莱迪 你父母

translation.en: they're conservative Zoroastrians.
translation.zh: 是保守的桑给巴尔人

translation.en: I wonder, what do they make of your public persona?
translation.zh: 他们怎么看你的公众形象？

translation.en: -Is that music... -My parents died in a fiery wreck.
translation.zh: -这跟音乐-我父母死于沉船事故

translation.en: I happen to know that's... that's not true, is it?
translation.zh: 我知道这不是真的

translation.en: I just wanted to know whether they were proud of you.
translation.zh: 我只想知道他们是否以你为荣？

translation.en: [Freddie] Are your parents proud of you?
translation.zh: 你的父母以你为荣吗？

translation.en: -Is this what they hoped for? -I hope that they are.
translation.zh: 这符合他们对你的期望吗？ 我希望如此

translation.en: -I surely don't think so. -Anyone wanna talk about the album?
translation.zh: 我可不这么觉得 有人想聊聊专辑吗？

translation.en: [all] Freddie! Freddie! Freddie!
translation.zh: 有人想聊聊专辑吗？ -佛莱迪-请你回答我的问题好吗？

translation.en: Could you answer my questions please?
translation.zh: -佛莱迪-请你回答我的问题好吗？

translation.en: -This better be good. -[overlapping shouting]
translation.zh: 最好提个好问题

translation.en: [man] Shut up!
translation.zh: 安静

translation.en: [woman] Freddie, could you tell us about the rumors concerning your sexuality?
translation.zh: 佛莱迪 能评论一下关于你性向的传闻吗？

translation.en: What about the rumors concerning your lack of sexuality?
translation.zh: 你又怎么看你缺少性生活的传闻呢？

translation.en: I'm just a musical prostitute, my dear.
translation.zh: 我只为音乐卖身 亲爱的

translation.en: [woman] Can you answer the question?
translation.zh: 你能回答刚才的问题吗？

translation.en: -What's your name, dear? -Shelley Stern.
translation.zh: 你叫什么 甜心？ 雪莉斯特恩

translation.en: -Shelley. -Yes.
translation.zh: -雪莉-是

translation.en: -That thing between your legs, does it bite? -Hah!
translation.zh: 你两腿间那个器官 会咬人吗？

translation.en: -Could you answer the question, please? -We're here as a courtesy.
translation.zh: 请回答我的问题好吗？

translation.en: You know, there's four of us up here.
translation.zh: -我们只是来露个面-我们这上面有四个人

translation.en: What are you afraid of, Freddie?
translation.zh: 你怕什么 佛莱迪？

translation.en: What... what do you want? What... what is the truth?
translation.zh: 你们想要什么？ 什么是真相？

translation.en: -Can you be honest for once? -[echo] Once... once...
translation.zh: 你不能说一次真话吗？

translation.en: [reporter] Why are you lying about your parents, Freddie?
translation.zh: 你父母的事你为何说谎 佛莱迪？

translation.en: I'm... I'm not lying about anything. I just, I'm...
translation.zh: 我没有说谎 我只是

translation.en: [reporter 2] Your fans deserve to know the truth, Freddie.
translation.zh: 你的歌迷需要知道真相 佛莱迪

translation.en: Can you answer the question, please?
translation.zh: 请你回答问题 好吗？

translation.en: This is my business. It's my business. [reporter] No, you're a public figure.
translation.zh: -这是我的私事-可你是公众人物

translation.en: What are you afraid of, Freddie?
translation.zh: -你怕什么 佛莱迪-你父母 -你能不能告诉我们-你的性取向

translation.en: -[reporter] Your parents? -[critic] Can you tell us about your sexuality?
translation.zh: -你能不能告诉我们-你的性取向

translation.en: -What? Why, why... -Can you just be honest?
translation.zh: 什么 为什么 为什么 你能不能说一次实话

translation.en: [reporter 3] Our readers want to know.
translation.zh: 我们的读者想知道

translation.en: What do your readers want to know? They want to know what?
translation.zh: 你们的读者想知道什么？他们想知道什么？

translation.en: ♪ But life still goes on ♪
translation.zh: 但生活还在继续

translation.en: ♪ I can't get used to living Without, living without ♪
translation.zh: 但我没有了你 没有了你

translation.en: ♪ Living without You by my side ♪
translation.zh: 但我没有了你 没有了你 没有了你活不下去

translation.en: ♪ I don't want to live alone ♪
translation.zh: 我不想自己住

translation.en: ♪ Hey ♪
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: ♪ God knows ♪
translation.zh: 上帝知道

translation.en: ♪ Got to make it on my own ♪
translation.zh: 我要把它变成我的

translation.en: ♪ So, baby, can't you see? ♪
translation.zh: 宝贝 你看不到吗？

translation.en: ♪ I've got to break free ♪
translation.zh: 我要挣脱束缚

translation.en: [Roger] Brilliant! Can I get up now? What is happening?
translation.zh: 真棒 我可以起来了吗？ 怎么了

translation.en: -[John] No, you can't. -[laughter]
translation.zh: 怎么了 不可以

translation.en: -[Brian] I wanna be in it. -[John] Get off me!
translation.zh: -我想听听-快下去

translation.en: Freddie, you in there?
translation.zh: 佛莱迪 你在里面吗？

translation.en: -[knocking] -Freddie?
translation.zh: 佛莱迪

translation.en: They're here.
translation.zh: 他们到了

translation.en: We can't put this off any longer.
translation.zh: 我们不能再拖了

translation.en: Freddie?
translation.zh: 佛莱迪

translation.en: [Freddie] MTV banned our video.
translation.zh: MTV禁了我们的录影带

translation.en: The youth of America. We helped give birth to MTV.
translation.zh: 美国的年轻人没有我们就没有MTV

translation.en: [Brian] It's America.
translation.zh: 这就是美国

translation.en: They're Puritans in public, perverts in private.
translation.zh: 明面上正人君子 私下里龌龊下流

translation.en: I'm never touring in the US again.
translation.zh: 我再也不到美国巡演了

translation.en: [chuckles dryly] And I'm the one being blamed for it.
translation.zh: 而且这还要怪到我头上

translation.en: Not you, dear...
translation.zh: 没人怪你

translation.en: whose idea, I believe, it was to dress up in drag. And not you.
translation.zh: 出主意要穿女装 也没人怪你

translation.en: Not even you, who wrote the bloody thing.
translation.zh: 甚至都没人怪你写了这该死的歌

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 没有

translation.en: Crazy, cross-dressing Freddie.
translation.zh: 疯狂变装佛莱迪

translation.en: Freddie the freak. Freddie the fag.
translation.zh: 变态佛莱迪 玻璃佛莱迪

translation.en: I'm tired of touring. Aren't you?
translation.zh: 我厌倦了巡演 你们呢

translation.en: Album, tour, album, tour.
translation.zh: 新专辑 巡演 新专辑 巡演

translation.en: I want to do something different.
translation.zh: 我想做点不一样的

translation.en: We're a band. That's what bands do.
translation.zh: 我们是乐队 乐队就是这样的

translation.en: -Album, tour, album, tour. -Well, I need a break.
translation.zh: 新专辑 巡演 新专辑 巡演 反正我得停一停了

translation.en: -I'm sick of it. -What are you saying, Freddie?
translation.zh: 我烦透了 你什么意思 佛莱迪？

translation.en: I've signed a deal with CBS Records.
translation.zh: 我跟CBS唱片签了合约

translation.en: -[Roger] You've done what? -Without telling us?
translation.zh: 你干了什么？ 都没跟我们商量

translation.en: What kind of deal?
translation.zh: 什么合约？

translation.en: Look, I'm not saying we won't record or ever tour again.
translation.zh: 我也没说我们不会再一起录音乐或者巡演了

translation.en: Queen will go on.
translation.zh: 皇后乐队还会继续

translation.en: But I need to do something different.
translation.zh: 但我需要做点不一样的事

translation.en: Do you know what I mean? I need-- I need to grow.
translation.zh: 明白我的意思吗？我需要成长

translation.en: What... what... what's the song? "Fly Away"?
translation.zh: 那首歌怎么唱的 《飞走》

translation.en: -"Spread my wings and fly away." -"Spread my wings and fly away."
translation.zh: -张开我的翅膀飞走-张开我的翅膀飞走

translation.en: A solo album?
translation.zh: 一张单人专辑

translation.en: [Paul] Two, actually.
translation.zh: 其实是两张

translation.en: -Back to back. -Another word out of you,
translation.zh: -连着发-你再说一个字

translation.en: and I'll throw you out the bloody window.
translation.zh: 我就把你从窗户扔出去

translation.en: But that's years, Freddie. I mean...
translation.zh: 但这要好几年 佛莱迪

translation.en: -that'll take years. -Ye of little faith.
translation.zh: -得花好几年呢-对我这么没信心

translation.en: I don't believe this.
translation.zh: 我无法相信

translation.en: How much?
translation.zh: 多少钱？

translation.en: What did they pay you?
translation.zh: 他们给你多少钱？

translation.en: -I wanna know how much they paid you-- -$4 million!
translation.zh: -我想知道他们给你多少钱-四百万美元

translation.en: That's more than any Queen deal.
translation.zh: 比皇后乐队的任何合约都多

translation.en: Look, the routine is killing us.
translation.zh: 例行程序让我们死气沉沉

translation.en: I mean, you must all want a break from all the arguments.
translation.zh: 你们肯定也不想再吵下去了

translation.en: I mean, whose song gets on the album,
translation.zh: 争论专辑收录谁的歌

translation.en: whose song's the single, who wrote what...
translation.zh: 谁的歌当单曲 谁写了什么

translation.en: who gets a bigger slice of the royalties, what's on the B-side, all of it.
translation.zh: 谁拿的版税多一些 哪个放在B面 这么多争执你们肯定得喘口气

translation.en: -You must need a break. -Freddie, we're a family.
translation.zh: 哪个放在B面 这么多争执你们肯定得喘口气 佛莱迪 我们是一家人

translation.en: No, we're not! We're not a family!
translation.zh: 我们不是 我们不是一家人

translation.en: You've got families, children, wives.
translation.zh: 我们不是一家人 你们都有家人 孩子 老婆

translation.en: What have I got?
translation.zh: 我有什么呢？

translation.en: You've got $4 million. Perhaps you can buy yourself a family.
translation.zh: 你有四百万美元或许你可以给自己买几个家人

translation.en: [Freddie] I won't compromise my vision any longer.
translation.zh: 我不会再在对未来的构想上妥协了

translation.en: -[sighs] -[Roger] Compromise?
translation.zh: 妥协

translation.en: Are you joking?
translation.zh: 开什么玩笑？

translation.en: You were working at Heathrow before we gave you a chance.
translation.zh: 要不是我们给你机会你还在希斯罗机场搬东西

translation.en: And without me... you-- you'd be a dentist...
translation.zh: 要是没有我 你会是个牙医

translation.en: drumming 12/8-time blues at the weekend at the Crown and Anchor.
translation.zh: 周末在皇冠与锚酒吧给12/8拍的蓝调打鼓呢

translation.en: And you. Well, you would be Dr. Brian May...
translation.zh: 还有你 你会是布赖恩梅博士

translation.en: author of a fascinating dissertation on the cosmos that no one ever reads.
translation.zh: 你会是布赖恩梅博士 著有关于宇宙的精彩论文 可惜无人阅读

translation.en: And Deacy...
translation.zh: 还有迪肯

translation.en: for the life of me... nothing comes to mind.
translation.zh: 我绞尽脑汁 也想不出什么

translation.en: I studied electrical engineering.
translation.zh: 我学的是电气工程

translation.en: -Does that meet your standard? -It's perfect.
translation.zh: 达到你的标准了没？ 很完美

translation.en: You just killed Queen.
translation.zh: 你就这么杀死了皇后

translation.en: Oh, give it a kiss one day. She might wake up.
translation.zh: 某日温柔轻吻 她从沉睡中被唤醒

translation.en: You need us, Freddie.
translation.zh: 你需要我们 佛莱迪

translation.en: -More than you know. -I don't need anyone.
translation.zh: 只是你还不知道 我谁也不需要

translation.en: -[drink pouring] -[phone ringing]
translation.zh: （慕尼黑 1984年）

translation.en: -[Freddie playing piano] -[Paul] Hello?
translation.zh: 喂

translation.en: -Paul. Can I speak to Freddie? -Oh, Mary. No, he can't talk right now.
translation.zh: 保罗 我能跟佛莱迪说几句吗？ 玛莉 他现在不方便接电话

translation.en: He's working day and night, constantly.
translation.zh: 他夜以继日地不停工作

translation.en: Will you make sure to tell him that I called?
translation.zh: 你能不能告诉他 我打过电话了

translation.en: Don't worry, he's in safe hands.
translation.zh: 别担心 他被照顾得很好

translation.en: I will certainly tell him you called.
translation.zh: 我一定会告诉他你来电话了

translation.en: Tschüs.
translation.zh: 再见

translation.en: -Freddie, it's really great. -[music stops]
translation.zh: 佛莱迪 真的很棒

translation.en: It's shit!
translation.zh: 这是垃圾

translation.en: Just leave it. [Paul] Yeah, hang on one second.
translation.zh: -别动它-好 等一下

translation.en: -[Freddie singing on recording] -Give it more treble.
translation.zh: 高音加强

translation.en: [Beach] Where is he? Is he there? I wanna speak to him.
translation.zh: 他在哪儿 他在吗？我想跟他通话

translation.en: He is working himself to the bone.
translation.zh: 他在拼命工作

translation.en: I'm blue in the face trying to get him to take a break.
translation.zh: 我磨破嘴皮他也不肯休息

translation.en: [Beach] Paul, listen to me. It's one performance for a good cause.
translation.zh: 保罗 听我说 只演一场 这是善举

translation.en: It's a televised concert for the famine in Ethiopia.
translation.zh: 电视直播的演唱会为埃塞俄比亚的饥荒募捐

translation.en: They're gonna have simultaneous performances in Philadelphia and London.
translation.zh: 他们会在费城和伦敦同时表演

translation.en: There's gonna be a billion people watching. Queen should be part of it.
translation.zh: 会有几十亿人观看 皇后乐队应该参加

translation.en: [Paul] He's just been really focused, but I'll be sure to pass it on.
translation.zh: 他就是太全神贯注了 不过我一定会转告他的

translation.en: Sure you will.
translation.zh: 当然了

translation.en: Hi.
translation.zh: 嗨

translation.en: [Freddie] Hi. Come in, come in.
translation.zh: 嗨 进来 快进来

translation.en: Why did you come all this way?
translation.zh: 你怎么大老远跑来了？

translation.en: I just haven't heard from you in so long, and I phoned and phoned, and then...
translation.zh: 我好久没听到你的消息了我打了好多次电话

translation.en: last night I just had this terrible dream that something bad had happened...
translation.zh: 我好久没听到你的消息了我打了好多次电话 昨天晚上我做了个噩梦发生了很可怕的事

translation.en: [Freddie] No, no. I've been working, that's all.
translation.zh: 没事 我只是一直在工作

translation.en: Freddie, you're burning the candle at both ends.
translation.zh: 佛莱迪 你在透支自己的身体

translation.en: Yes, but the glow is so divine.
translation.zh: 是啊 但成果璀璨

translation.en: Being human is a condition that requires a little anesthesia.
translation.zh: 生而为人 不得不需要点麻醉

translation.en: -I miss you. -I miss you. I miss you so much.
translation.zh: -我想你了-我也想你 我特别想你

translation.en: Listen, but I have to finish the second album.
translation.zh: 但我得录完第二张专辑

translation.en: I need you.
translation.zh: 我需要你

translation.en: Stay. Stay here with me. Just you and me.
translation.zh: 留下 留下来陪我 只有你和我

translation.en: I need the love of my life.
translation.zh: 我需要我的至爱

translation.en: Freddie... What about Queen?
translation.zh: 佛莱迪 皇后乐队怎么办？

translation.en: Jim told me he's been trying to contact you about Live Aid,
translation.zh: 皇后乐队怎么办？ 吉姆说他一直想联系你商量拯救生命的演出

translation.en: and you won't take his calls.
translation.zh: 但你不肯接他的电话

translation.en: What is Live Aid?
translation.zh: 拯救生命是什么？

translation.en: You haven't heard?
translation.zh: 你没听说吗？

translation.en: Freddie, it's the biggest concert there's ever been or ever will be.
translation.zh: 佛莱迪 这是史上最盛大的演唱会空前绝后

translation.en: It's for the famine in Africa.
translation.zh: 这是为了非洲的饥荒筹款

translation.en: Well, perhaps Paul thought it wasn't a good idea.
translation.zh: 这是为了非洲的饥荒筹款 或许保罗觉得这主意不太好

translation.en: A distraction from my work.
translation.zh: 会打扰我的工作

translation.en: That's what's important, that I finish this album.
translation.zh: 我完成专辑才是当务之急

translation.en: -Stay with me, darling, and I'll be all right. -Freddie, I can't stay with you.
translation.zh: 留下陪我 亲爱的 我就会没事了 佛莱迪 我不能留下

translation.en: -Of course you can. I need you, Mary. -Freddie, I'm pregnant.
translation.zh: 佛莱迪 我不能留下 你当然可以了 我需要你 玛莉 佛莱迪 我怀孕了

translation.en: How could you?
translation.zh: 你怎么能怀孕?

translation.en: How could I?
translation.zh: 我怎么能怀孕?

translation.en: -Freddie, this has nothing to do with you. -[Paul] Come on. Let's get in.
translation.zh: 佛莱迪 这跟你没有关系 来吧 我们进去

translation.en: -I bought some nibbles. -[door opens]
translation.zh: 我买了点吃的

translation.en: Freddie.
translation.zh: 佛莱迪

translation.en: -Sorry we're late. -[men laughing]
translation.zh: 抱歉 我们来晚了

translation.en: Mary.
translation.zh: 玛莉

translation.en: What a pleasant surprise.
translation.zh: 真是惊喜

translation.en: Hans. Everyone, come in.
translation.zh: 汉斯 大家进来吧

translation.en: Milan, make our guests comfortable.
translation.zh: 汉斯 大家进来吧 米兰 招呼一下客人

translation.en: I wish I knew you were coming to stay.
translation.zh: 早知道你要来住的话

translation.en: I'd have scrubbed the place.
translation.zh: 我就会把这里收拾一下

translation.en: -Actually, I'm not staying. -Wait. Mary, wait. Don't go.
translation.zh: 事实上 我不会住下 等等 玛莉 等等 别走

translation.en: You told me you had a dream.
translation.zh: 你说你做了个梦

translation.en: What was it?
translation.zh: 什么梦？

translation.en: I was trying to talk to you...
translation.zh: 我想跟你说话 但是

translation.en: ...but it was like talking to my father.
translation.zh: 就像跟我爸爸说话一样

translation.en: You needed to tell me something...
translation.zh: 你有话要跟我说

translation.en: but you couldn't say it.
translation.zh: 但却说不出来

translation.en: Because you had no voice.
translation.zh: 因为你发不出声了

translation.en: [Paul] Freddie, come and say hello to our new guests.
translation.zh: 佛莱迪 来跟我们的新客人打个招呼

translation.en: -They're dying to meet you. -[sniffs]
translation.zh: 他们可想见你了

translation.en: -[door opens] -He'll be one second.
translation.zh: 他马上就来

translation.en: [Freddie] Mary!
translation.zh: 玛莉

translation.en: I'm happy for you, Mary.
translation.zh: 我很为你高兴 玛莉

translation.en: Truly, I am.
translation.zh: 真的

translation.en: It's just...
translation.zh: 只是

translation.en: -I'm frightened. -Freddie, you don't need to be.
translation.zh: 我很害怕 佛莱迪 你不用害怕

translation.en: Because no matter what, you are loved.
translation.zh: 因为无论怎样 你都被人爱着

translation.en: By me, by Brian, Deacy, Roger... your family.
translation.zh: 我 布赖恩 迪肯 罗杰 你的家人

translation.en: It's enough.
translation.zh: 这就够了

translation.en: And these people... they don't care about you.
translation.zh: 而这些人 他们才不在乎你

translation.en: Paul doesn't care about you.
translation.zh: 保罗不在乎你

translation.en: You don't belong here, Freddie.
translation.zh: 你不属于这里 佛莱迪

translation.en: Come home.
translation.zh: 回家吧

translation.en: Home.
translation.zh: 家

translation.en: Freddie!
translation.zh: 佛莱迪

translation.en: What are you doing? You'll catch your death.
translation.zh: 你在做什么？你会病倒的

translation.en: Why didn't you tell me about Live Aid?
translation.zh: 你为什么不告诉我拯救生命的事？

translation.en: The Africa charity gig?
translation.zh: 那个非洲慈善演出吗？

translation.en: It'll be an embarrassment. I didn't wanna waste your time.
translation.zh: 太掉价了 我不想浪费你的时间

translation.en: -You should have told me. -Of course I did.
translation.zh: 你应该告诉我的 我当然告诉你了

translation.en: You forgot.
translation.zh: 是你忘了

translation.en: You're always forgetting things.
translation.zh: 你老是忘事

translation.en: Come in now and have a drink.
translation.zh: 赶快进来喝一杯

translation.en: -You're out. -[Paul] What do you mean?
translation.zh: 你走吧 你什么意思？

translation.en: I want you out of my life.
translation.zh: 我想要你离开我的生活

translation.en: 'Cause I'm the only one left, you're blaming me for everything?
translation.zh: 因为只剩下我了你就全都怪到我头上

translation.en: I blame myself.
translation.zh: 我怪我自己

translation.en: So I'm out? Just like that?
translation.zh: 你不要我了 就这样吗？

translation.en: After everything we've been through?
translation.zh: 我们一起经历了那么多

translation.en: Just think of the photos I have.
translation.zh: 想想我手上那些照片

translation.en: I know who you are, Freddie Mercury.
translation.zh: 我知道你是什么货色 佛莱迪摩克瑞

translation.en: [Freddie] You know when you know you've gone rotten?
translation.zh: 人怎么才能知道自己已经腐烂了呢?

translation.en: Really rotten?
translation.zh: 烂透了

translation.en: Fruit flies.
translation.zh: 果蝇

translation.en: Dirty little fruit flies.
translation.zh: 肮脏渺小的果蝇

translation.en: Coming to feast on what's left.
translation.zh: 扑上来蚕食剩下的东西

translation.en: Well, there isn't much left for you to feast on anymore.
translation.zh: 现在也没什么可供你蚕食的了

translation.en: -["Under Pressure" plays] -So, fly off.
translation.zh: 所以 快滚吧

translation.en: Do what you like with your photographs and your stories.
translation.zh: 随你怎么处理照片 怎么讲故事

translation.en: But promise me one thing:
translation.zh: 但答应我一件事

translation.en: That I never see your face again.
translation.zh: 永远别再让我看见你的脸

translation.en: Ever.
translation.zh: 永远

translation.en: I didn't mean it.
translation.zh: 我不是那个意思

translation.en: -I'm sorry! Freddie, come back! -♪ Pushing down on me ♪ -♪ Pressin' down on you ♪ -I'll make it better.
translation.zh: 对不起 佛莱迪 回来

translation.en: ♪ No man ask for ♪
translation.zh: 我会补偿你

translation.en: [Paul] But, Peter, you might be right. I'm not even hurt
translation.zh: 但皮特 你可能是对的

translation.en: by the fact that he's let me go as a friend.
translation.zh: 让我受伤的不是作为朋友的他让我走

translation.en: But you can only be there so much for a person.
translation.zh: 但你对一个人也只能做到这样了

translation.en: [journalist] And so, Mr. Prenter...
translation.zh: 但你对一个人也只能做到这样了 普伦特先生

translation.en: all these stories about Freddie Mercury and his lovers...
translation.zh: 关于佛莱迪摩克瑞和他情人们

translation.en: -that there were so many. -[Paul] Yeah?
translation.zh: 这么多的故事 怎么

translation.en: [journalist] Is it really true?
translation.zh: -是真的吗？-是

translation.en: [Paul] Yes, it is. His lovers were countless.
translation.zh: -是真的吗？-是 他有数不尽的情人

translation.en: Genuinely countless. Uh...
translation.zh: 真的数不过来

translation.en: All these wild, drug-fueled parties
translation.zh: 在他充满毒品的狂野派对上

translation.en: where he'd find another lover every night and...
translation.zh: 他每晚都找一个新情人

translation.en: and a routine he couldn't get out of.
translation.zh: 日复一日 停不下来

translation.en: [journalist] So, you really did see behind the mask?
translation.zh: 那么你真的见过面具下的他吗？

translation.en: I knew Freddie when he did "Bohemian Rhapsody."
translation.zh: 我认识创作《波西米亚狂想曲》的佛莱迪

translation.en: And the Freddie we have now...
translation.zh: 和现在我们看到的佛莱迪

translation.en: he doesn't have the same passion about music.
translation.zh: 他对音乐的热情不再一样

translation.en: -Hello? -Miami?
translation.zh: 喂 迈阿密

translation.en: -Freddie? How are you? -There was this Africa concert...
translation.zh: 佛莱迪 你还好吗？ 有个非洲的演唱会

translation.en: -that wants Queen to play. Is that still... -You mean Live Aid?
translation.zh: 想让皇后乐队演出 是不是还… 你说拯救生命

translation.en: They've announced all the bands, Freddie. It's too late.
translation.zh: 你说拯救生命 他们已经公布了所有乐队 佛莱迪 来不及了

translation.en: I need... I need to reconnect with the mothership.
translation.zh: 我需要 我需要跟其他成员恢复联系

translation.en: Freddie, they don't want anything to do with you.
translation.zh: 佛莱迪 他们不想跟你有任何关系

translation.en: They're still very upset.
translation.zh: 他们还在生你的气

translation.en: Maybe if-- if you ask them, they would meet me.
translation.zh: 如果你跟他们提出来 也许他们会见我一面

translation.en: Tell them I want to talk.
translation.zh: 告诉他们我想谈谈

translation.en: Just talk.
translation.zh: 只是谈谈

translation.en: We're family.
translation.zh: 我们是一家人

translation.en: You know, family... have fights...
translation.zh: 你知道 家庭 发生冲突

translation.en: ...all the time.
translation.zh: 是常有的事

translation.en: -I can call. -Thank you...
translation.zh: 我可以打个电话 谢谢你

translation.en: ...Jim.
translation.zh: 吉姆

translation.en: [journalist] As this friend, somebody who...
translation.zh: 作为他的朋友

translation.en: probably knows Freddie Mercury better than anybody else,
translation.zh: 我比其他人都了解佛莱迪摩克瑞

translation.en: how would you describe him inside as a person?
translation.zh: 你怎么评价他这个人的内在呢？

translation.en: For me, Freddie will always be this frightened little Paki boy...
translation.zh: 对我而言 佛莱迪永远是个 胆怯的巴基斯坦小男孩

translation.en: who's afraid to be alone.
translation.zh: 害怕孤独

translation.en: -["Under Pressure" resumes] -[journalist] I hope he sees this, and realizes
translation.zh: 我希望他看见这段采访意识到他失去你的损失

translation.en: what he has lost in you.
translation.zh: 我希望他看见这段采访意识到他失去你的损失 我也希望如此

translation.en: -[Paul] I hope he does, too. -[journalist] A close and important friend.
translation.zh: 我也希望如此 你是个亲密而重要的朋友

translation.en: Where are they?
translation.zh: 他们在哪儿？

translation.en: They're late.
translation.zh: 他们晚了

translation.en: -[Beach] Hi, guys. -[Brian] Jim.
translation.zh: 你们好 吉姆

translation.en: [Beach] If anybody wants any tea, coffee,
translation.zh: 有谁想要茶 咖啡

translation.en: bladed weapons, just-- just ask.
translation.zh: 凶器的话 尽管 尽管开口

translation.en: So...
translation.zh: 那么

translation.en: -who wants to go first? -I'll start.
translation.zh: 谁想先说 我先来

translation.en: I've been hideous. I know that, and... I deserve your fury.
translation.zh: 我态度恶劣 我知道 你们生我气也是应该的

translation.en: I've been conceited...
translation.zh: 我傲慢

translation.en: selfish...
translation.zh: 自私

translation.en: -Well, an asshole, basically. -Strong beginning.
translation.zh: 基本上 就是个混蛋 开场很有力

translation.en: Look, I'm happy to strip off my shirt
translation.zh: 我很愿意把自己扒光了

translation.en: and flagellate myself before you.
translation.zh: 在你们面前抽我自己

translation.en: Or rather, I could ask you a simple question.
translation.zh: 但我也可以问你们一个简单的问题

translation.en: I'm good with the flagellation.
translation.zh: 抽你自己就行了

translation.en: What's it gonna take for you all to forgive me?
translation.zh: 你们要怎样才肯原谅我

translation.en: Is that what you want, Freddie?
translation.zh: 你就想要我们的原谅吗？佛莱迪

translation.en: -I forgive you. Is that it? Can we go now? -No.
translation.zh: 我原谅你 -就这样吗？我们能走了吗？-不

translation.en: I went to Munich. I hired a bunch of guys.
translation.zh: 我去了慕尼黑 我雇了一大帮人

translation.en: I told them exactly what I wanted them to do,
translation.zh: 我仔仔细细告诉他们我想让他们干什么

translation.en: and the problem was...
translation.zh: 问题是

translation.en: ...they did it.
translation.zh: 他们照做了

translation.en: No pushback from Roger.
translation.zh: 没有罗杰那样的反对

translation.en: None of your rewrites. None of his funny looks.
translation.zh: 没有你的重写 没有他的鬼脸

translation.en: I need you.
translation.zh: 我需要你们

translation.en: And you need me.
translation.zh: 你们也需要我

translation.en: [pats] Let's face it. We're not bad for four aging queens.
translation.zh: 直说吧 我们四个中年皇后也还算不赖

translation.en: So, um, go ahead. Name your terms.
translation.zh: 说吧 你们开条件

translation.en: Could you give us a moment please, Fred?
translation.zh: 让我们商量一下 好吗？佛莱迪

translation.en: Why'd you do that?
translation.zh: 你干嘛？让他出去

translation.en: -I just felt like it. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 只是觉得好玩

translation.en: They'll be all right. They just need a bit of time.
translation.zh: 他们会答应的 只是需要点时间

translation.en: What if I don't have time?
translation.zh: 假如我没有时间了呢？

translation.en: What do you mean, Fred?
translation.zh: 你是什么意思 佛莱迪？

translation.en: You can come back in now, if you'd like.
translation.zh: 你们可以进来了 请吧

translation.en: We decided...
translation.zh: 我们决定

translation.en: -What did we decide? -From now on...
translation.zh: 我们决定什么来着？ 从现在开始

translation.en: every song, no matter who wrote it, music, lyrics...
translation.zh: 每首歌 不管是谁写的不论曲还是词

translation.en: it's by Queen.
translation.zh: 署名都是皇后乐队

translation.en: Not one of us, just Queen.
translation.zh: 不是某个个人 只写皇后乐队

translation.en: All the money, all the credits, split four ways evenly.
translation.zh: 所有钱 所有功劳 平分四份

translation.en: Done.
translation.zh: 没问题

translation.en: We have a problem with the people around you.
translation.zh: 我们对你身边的人也有意见

translation.en: Paul is out. I fired him.
translation.zh: 保罗不在了 我把他开了

translation.en: -On what pretext? -Villainy.
translation.zh: -以什么理由？-作恶

translation.en: -What else? -Bob Geldof.
translation.zh: 还有什么事？ 鲍勃格尔多夫

translation.en: I called to convince him to squeeze you guys into the lineup for the Live Aid concert,
translation.zh: 我说服了他把你们挤进拯救生命演唱会名单

translation.en: but he wants an answer now.
translation.zh: 但你们得现在给他答复

translation.en: You have to make a decision.
translation.zh: 你们得做决定了

translation.en: Every ticket's already sold.
translation.zh: 票全卖光了

translation.en: 100,000 people at Wembley... 100,000 people at JFK Stadium in Philadelphia...
translation.zh: 温布利球场十万观众 费城约翰肯尼迪体育场十万观众

translation.en: a global TV audience around the world of 150 countries, 13 satellites.
translation.zh: 全球150个国家的电视观众 13个卫星直播

translation.en: The Olympics only had three.
translation.zh: 奥运会也只有3个

translation.en: We haven't played together in years.
translation.zh: 我们好几年没一起演出了

translation.en: It's kinda suicide to play again for the first time in front of millions.
translation.zh: 复出第一次演出 就面对百万观众 有点太危险

translation.en: Try over 1.5 billion.
translation.zh: 那可是十五亿人

translation.en: [scoffs] "Who are these four dinosaurs?"
translation.zh: 这四个老古董是谁

translation.en: "Where's Madonna?"
translation.zh: 麦当娜在哪儿？

translation.en: It's a 20-minute set. Everyone gets the same.
translation.zh: 只是段20分钟的演出所有人都是这么长

translation.en: Jagger, Bowie...
translation.zh: 米克贾格尔 大卫鲍伊

translation.en: Elton...
translation.zh: 埃尔顿约翰

translation.en: McCartney, The Who...
translation.zh: 保罗麦卡特尼 谁人乐队

translation.en: Led Zeppelin...
translation.zh: 齐柏林飞艇

translation.en: Phil Collins, REO Speedwagon...
translation.zh: 菲尔柯林斯 快速马车

translation.en: Bob Dylan.
translation.zh: 鲍勃迪伦

translation.en: Certainly good company.
translation.zh: 都是很好的同台演出者

translation.en: [Beach] Anybody who is anybody is doing this concert.
translation.zh: 但凡有名气的人都去这场演唱会

translation.en: Look. All I know...
translation.zh: 听着 我只知道

translation.en: is that if we wake up the day after this concert...
translation.zh: 如果我们在这场演唱会第二天醒来

translation.en: and we didn't do our part...
translation.zh: 没有去表演

translation.en: we're going to regret it till the day we die.
translation.zh: 我们会后悔到死的那天

translation.en: Please.
translation.zh: 求你们了

translation.en: [news anchor] Every day, in San Francisco, two more men hear the grim news...
translation.zh: 在旧金山每天都有两个男子听到可怕的消息

translation.en: "You have AIDS, there's no cure."
translation.zh: 在旧金山每天都有两个男子听到可怕的消息 你得了艾滋 无法医治

translation.en: Since doctors in France and America isolated the virus in 1983,
translation.zh: 自法国和美国的医生在1983年分离了病毒以来

translation.en: research has proceeded at a frantic pace.
translation.zh: 自法国和美国的医生在1983年分离了病毒以来 研究的进展飞速

translation.en: The method used by the virus to destroy
translation.zh: 研究的进展飞速 该病毒摧毁人体免疫系统的方式

translation.en: the body's immune system has been discovered...
translation.zh: 该病毒摧毁人体免疫系统的方式 已被发现

translation.en: -♪ There's no time for us ♪ -...but a cure still seems many years away.
translation.zh: 已被发现 我们没有时间了

translation.en: -A major breakthrough has been a new blood test... -♪ There's no place for us ♪
translation.zh: 一项重大突破是一种新的血液检测 目的在于确保未来 不会再有人从血液传播中感染艾滋病毒

translation.en: ♪ What is this thing That builds our dreams ♪
translation.zh: 但此项检测刚刚才被批准采用 是什么筑造了我们的梦

translation.en: ♪ Yet slips away from us? ♪
translation.zh: 又从我们身边溜走？

translation.en: ♪ Who wants to live forever ♪
translation.zh: 谁想长生不死？

translation.en: ♪ Who wants to live forever? ♪
translation.zh: 谁想长生不死？

translation.en: ♪ There's no chance for us ♪
translation.zh: 我们没有机会

translation.en: ♪ It's all decided for us ♪
translation.zh: 一切都已注定

translation.en: ♪ This world has only one ♪
translation.zh: 世界上只有一个

translation.en: ♪ Sweet moment Set aside for us ♪
translation.zh: 我们的美好时光

translation.en: [doctor] Do you understand?
translation.zh: 你明白吗？

translation.en: The way we go from here is that treatments are available.
translation.zh: 对于这种情况 有几种治疗方法

translation.en: They're not particularly effective, Freddie.
translation.zh: 还不是特别有效 佛莱迪

translation.en: Yep.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: -Let's call it. Yeah? -Yeah, yeah.
translation.zh: -就练到这儿吧 好吗？-好

translation.en: Sorry.
translation.zh: 抱歉

translation.en: I sound like shit.
translation.zh: 我唱得太差了

translation.en: You all are lovely, you sound good.
translation.zh: 你们很棒 表现不错

translation.en: Been a while.
translation.zh: 只是太久不练了

translation.en: My throat feels like a vulture's crotch.
translation.zh: 我的嗓子烂得要命

translation.en: -[all chuckle] -[Roger] We still got a week.
translation.zh: 我们还有一周时间

translation.en: -[John] We'll get there. -[Brian] Yeah, we're in a good place, Fred.
translation.zh: 会达到水平的 是啊 我们状态很好 佛莱迪

translation.en: You just need a bit of rest, that's all.
translation.zh: 是啊 我们状态很好 佛莱迪 你只是需要休息一下而已

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: -[John] Get a drink, Rog? -[Roger] Yeah, there's a nice little pub
translation.zh: 去喝一杯吗？罗杰

translation.en: -down the road, actually. -[Brian] Can I come?
translation.zh: 好啊 附近有家不错的小酒馆 我能一起去吗？

translation.en: [John] We're just an exclusive... [Roger] No, of course not. Invite-only.
translation.zh: -我们排斥外人-当然不行了

translation.en: [Brian] Yeah, that's kind of you.
translation.zh: -非请勿来-你们可真友好

translation.en: [Freddie] Before you leave...
translation.zh: 你们走之前

translation.en: -Could I have a second? -[Roger] Yeah. What's up?
translation.zh: 能占用你们点时间吗？ 嗯 怎么了？

translation.en: I've got it.
translation.zh: 我得了那个

translation.en: Got what?
translation.zh: 得了什么？

translation.en: AIDS.
translation.zh: 艾滋

translation.en: I wanted you to hear it from me.
translation.zh: 我想亲自告诉你们
